LanguageData.HybridTooltip: The chance for pawns to spawn with a set of genes generated from two valid parent Xenotypes
LanguageData.RandomGenesTooltip: The chance for pawns to spawn with entirely random genes, only constrained by metabolism limits

LanguageData.WeightDistrubutionHint: Weighted Xenotypes will get distrubuted among
